title: Fast and Furious 8 teaser trailer released for Super Bowl | Daily Mail Online
text: comments A new trailer for Fast And Furious 8 was released during the Super Bowl hot spot break. The one minute trailer gives more insight on what's about to go down with an epic battle that'll be much bigger than expected. Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) and Deckard (Jason Statham) are about to lash it out in what can only be one memorable showdown. Scroll down for video Smooch! Charlize Theron kisses Vin Diesel in new trailer for Fast And Furious 8 It's on! Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham are about to battle it out in Fast And Furious 8 based on the new trailer released on Super Bowl Sunday The new trailer shows these guys' attitudes, not just in their fighting skills, but in the way they mock each other. Hobbs wants to know why he would be put in the same room with this guy when Deckard tells him that the size of his small T-shirt could be cutting off the circulation in his brain. The fun doesn't stop there though. Working together: The actors' characters are going to team up and throw snippy dialogue at each other along the way It turns out that these guys have been ordered to work together. Clearly, neither of them are happy about it, but they may have what it takes to tackle more fights ahead of them. Considering that these two actors are known as action icons, it's likely they will bring something entertaining for the eighth installment of the franchise. Kiss of death: Dom (Vin Diesel) gets sucked in to the world of crime run by Cipher (Charlize Theron), leaving his family behind What now? Letty (Michelle Rodriguez) tells Dom that he's betraying his family That's not the only insane storyline that's about to happen. Charlize Theron is appearing in the film as Cipher, a manipulative woman who seduces Dom (Vin Diesel) into a world of crime. This leads some of Dom's loved ones, including Letty to realize he's not the man he used to be. Hot in here: The film will stay true to its steamy content with risque dancing Car chases: Audiences can expect more intriguing scenes with action-packed sequences Escaping the ice: One scene in the trailer shows a new car chase with plenty of rage The trailer showed more exciting moments along the way, including a pile of cars toppling face first into the street. Then there's a car chase on frozen ice where someone's about to be sucked in...only to be saved in the most outrageous way possible. Fast And Furious 8 hits theaters on April 14. We're back!
